org.apache.james.jspf
Class DNSServiceXBillImpl

java.lang.Object
  org.apache.james.jspf.DNSServiceXBillImpl
All Implemented Interfaces:
DNSService
public class DNSServiceXBillImpl
extends java.lang.Object
implements DNSService

This class contains helper to get all neccassary DNS infos that are needed for SPF

getSpfRecord

public java.lang.String getSpfRecord(java.lang.String hostname,
                                     java.lang.String spfVersion)
                              throws PermErrorException,
                                     NoneException,
                                     TempErrorException
Description copied from interface: DNSService
Get the SPF-Record for a server given it's version TODO: support SPF Records too. This will be done if dnsjava support it!

Specified by:
getSpfRecord in interface DNSService
Parameters:
hostname - The hostname for which we want to retrieve the SPF-Record
spfVersion - The SPF-Version which should used.
Returns:
The SPF-Record if one is found.
Throws:
PermErrorException - if more then one SPF-Record was found.
NoneException - if no SPF-Record was found.
TempErrorException - if the lookup result was "TRY_AGAIN"
See Also:
DNSService.getSpfRecord(java.lang.String, java.lang.String)
